text: Jimmy Fallon and Lin - Manuel Miranda are two goats in a boat! The 43 - year - old late night TV host and the 38 - year - old playwright teamed up for a hilarious video posted on Jimmy ‘ s Instagram on Friday ( June 1 ). PHOTOS : Check out the latest pics of Jimmy Fallon In the funny clip, Jimmy and Lin - Manuel go kayaking while singing their duet about goats and boats – and even debut their matching goatees. “ Goatee Summer w / @ Lin _ Manuel. # FridayFeeling # TwoGoatees # TwoGoatsInABoat # WePutOurCoatsInOurTotes in a, ” Jimmy wrote on Twitter.
